ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: This is nothing but the word of a mortal!"

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: It is nothing but the word of a mortal'

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: This is not but the word of a human being."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [74:25] this is nothing but the speech of humans’, similar to what they [the idolaters] had said: ‘It is only a human that is teaching him’ [Q. 16:103].
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (This) which Muhammad (pbuh) says, is (naught else than speech of mortal man) the speech of Jabr and Yasar.
